title: IIT Guwahati Recruitment 2025 - Apply for Assistant Project Engineer Post
description: Indian Institute of Technology Guwahati (IIT Guwahati) has declared the official notification for 2025. To fill up the vacancies for Assistant Project Engineer Jobs. Those candidates who have qualified in the B.E/ B.Tech. in Electrical Engineering, Electronics and Communication Engineering  Pass can grab this chance and apply for the IIT Guwahati Recruitment 2025 . Here, we mentioned the age limit, selection process, salary structure, education details, application fee, and how to apply for t...
